title: Dick Tracy. Vol. 1
creator_credit: Republic Pictures Corporation and Alan James
brief_description: This movie serial sees for the first time on screen Dick Tracy (Ralph Byrd) and his G-men battling against urban evil. This time it’s the club-footed mastermind know as The Lame One who plots a war on the G-men. Using his stratospheric aircraft he terrorises the city with his high-frequency sound wave weapon. At the same time, The Spider Gang kidnap Tracy’s brother, Gordon. Part one consists of the first seven episodes.
